title: GenAI Ops Automation Platform
description: Built a GenAI-powered automation platform for customer support and finance ops, reducing manual workload by 70-80%
longDescription:
Built a comprehensive GenAI-powered automation platform that transformed customer support and finance operations. The platform leverages n8n automation, Google Gemini for natural language understanding, and Pinecone for RAG-based policy grounding.

Key components include:
- 5-label LLM intent classification for automated ticket routing
- RAG-based response generation grounded in company policies
- OCR + LLM invoice processing pipeline extracting 9+ financial fields
- Automatic synchronization with Sheets and data warehouses

The system reduced first-response time to 10-15 seconds while improving compliance and cutting reconciliation time by 60-75%.

title: Food Delivery Sector Financial Analysis
description: Conducted comprehensive DCF valuation and growth strategy analysis for a leading food delivery platform
longDescription:
Performed an in-depth financial valuation and strategic analysis for a leading food delivery platform, supported by GenAI-assisted research across 1,200+ industry documents.

Key deliverables:
- DCF valuation model (Enterprise Value: ₹72,035 Cr; Equity Value: ₹66,376 Cr)
- Benchmarking against ₹2.9 Lakh Cr market cap
- Competitor analysis and SWOT assessment
- Scenario planning and sensitivity analysis
- Strategic recommendations for margin optimization and category expansion

The analysis identified key valuation drivers including quick-commerce economics and market positioning, while recommending a balanced growth strategy.

title: AI-Powered Market Intelligence Platform
description: Designing LLM-based frameworks for equity analysis across 1,000+ instruments with automated workflows
longDescription:
Working on an AI-powered market and trading platform that supports data-driven investment decision-making across 1,000+ equity instruments using structured financial data and market signals.

Key features:
- LLM-based company evaluation frameworks incorporating 10+ fundamental metrics
- Balance-sheet strength indicators and growth signals
- Market and news narrative analysis
- AI-driven market intelligence and decision-support tools
- Automated end-to-end financial analysis workflows using n8n

The platform reduces manual analysis effort by 60-70% while improving insight delivery speed and consistency.

title: Automated Invoice Processing Pipeline
description: OCR + LLM pipeline for extracting financial data from invoices with 95% accuracy
longDescription:
Engineered an automated invoice processing pipeline combining OCR and LLM technologies to extract and validate financial data from invoices.

The pipeline extracts 9+ critical financial fields including:
- Invoice number and date
- Vendor information
- Line items and amounts
- Tax calculations
- Payment terms

Extracted data is automatically synchronized into Google Sheets and data warehouses, reducing reconciliation time by 60-75% and achieving 95% accuracy.
